channel.title: Resources on Gaia Sky
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on Gaia Sky

item.title: Datasets and catalogs
item.description:
This page lists the last version for each dataset in Gaia Sky. You can download each dataset directly from within Gaia Sky using the dataset manager (recommended!), or by following the ‘Dataset files’ link in each dataset. In order to install any of the packages manually, just download it and extract the contents it in your data folder (defaults to $HOME/.local/share/gaiasky/data/ in Linux, and $HOME/.gaiasky/data in Windows and macOS).

Click on the dataset title to reveal more information.
